amendment.description: To provide funding for administrative expenses of the United States Agency for International Development.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1986 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1986 proposed by Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S13344-13345; text: CR S13344) To provide funding for administrative expenses of the United States Agency for International Development.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1986 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1986 proposed by Senator Leahy.
